release_body:
## Release Highlights
- Fixed release workflow so unsigned macOS builds do not attempt certificate import/codesign.
- Added explicit signed vs unsigned macOS build gating based on available Apple signing inputs.
- Kept Windows release bundling on NSIS to avoid MSI prerelease version restrictions.

## Release Tooling
- `bump_versions.py` now accepts both `0.5.0a6` and `v0.5.0a6` style input.
- Added `generate_release_metadata.py` to transform local `release_metadata.md` into tracked `.github/release/metadata.json`.
- Updated release docs (`README.md`, `CONTRIBUTING.md`, `docs/release_process.md`) with the new two-script flow.

## CI/Tests
- Added regression tests for version normalization and release metadata generation logic.
